艾利臣解釋為何揀紅軍棄車仔

西維爾想借莫拉達爭西甲冠軍

車路士在去年夏天打算收購艾利臣取替離隊的高圖爾斯，但前者選擇紅軍令車仔最終以破紀錄的7,200萬鎊轉會費買入西班牙門將阿列沙巴拿加。

對於選擇利物浦而不是車仔，艾利臣解釋說︰「因為車仔剛換了領隊，而且沒有歐聯資格。」

「此外，我一直十分欣賞利物浦的歷史，曾贏得5次歐聯冠軍，我想成為當中一部分。去年我在羅馬幾乎贏得歐聯，現在我想在紅軍再嘗試。假若人生沒有夢想將會怎樣？我的夢想是贏得歐聯冠軍。」(Goal.com)

車仔有機？肉彈太太暗示伊卡迪出「國」

now.com 體育 now.com 體育2019年1月10日 上午7:55
【now.com體育】國際米蘭射手莫路伊卡迪的太太兼經理人Wanda Nara暗示丈夫不會續約，車路士或有機會簽下該阿根廷球星。
國際米蘭射手莫路伊卡迪（Mauro Icardi）有傳將以1億英鎊加盟車路士，其妻子兼經理人Wanda Nara日前放風指距離與國米續約十分遙遠，暗示很大機會離隊他投。「到今天續約還非常遙遠，我不能否認會達成共識，但至今看不到任何跡象。」Wanda Nara說。 原來，伊卡迪於2016年與國際米蘭續約時，合約列明意甲以外的球隊斟介的話，解約金是1億英鎊。而這個數剛好與車路士提出的數額一致，可見該阿根廷射手合符「上車」條件。 向來言行出位，身材惹火的Wanda Nara明言有4家球隊對老公感興趣，「兩家來自西班牙，一家來自英超，還有一家來自法甲。」之前傳聞，西甲的皇家馬德里和巴塞隆拿想羅致伊卡迪，英超自然是指車路士，法甲則是巴黎聖日耳門。如此多的好選擇，國際米蘭如何留人？

https://www.telegraph.co.uk/football/2019/01/10/chelsea-reject-barcelona-bid-willian-offer-brazilian-forward/amp/?__twitter_impression=true

Chelsea reject Barcelona bid for Willian – and the offer of Malcom as part of swap deal

Chelsea have rejected an offer from Barcelona to swap Willian for Malcom plus cash.

It is understood that the Spanish giants are prepared to move Malcom on even though they paid £38 million for him from Bordeaux only last summer.

Willian has been a Barcelona target in the past, on more than one occasion, but Chelsea are not believed to be interested in letting him go for Malcom plus a sum of cash which would value the deal at around £50 million.

Even though Willian has just turned 30 and only has 18 months left on his current contract Chelsea value him higher than the proposal that was put to them by Barcelona representatives on Thursday.

Barcelona bought Malcom, 21, who have previously interested Tottenham Hotspur, after being rebuffed in their efforts to sign his fellow Brazilian, Willian.


Chelsea regard Willian as a key member of their squad and are looking to strengthen this window rather than let first-team regulars go. They have already had a series of offers from Bayern Munich for 18-year-old winger Callum Hudson-Odoi who is keen to leave.

Barcelona may look to sell Malcom, who they snatched away from Roma, in any case during this window even if they cannot interest Chelsea as he has struggled to get into their first-team squad.

quote.msg:
https://www.telegraph.co.uk/football/2019/01/10/chelsea-reject-barcelona-bid-willian-offer-brazilian-forward/amp/?__twitter_impression=true

Chelsea reject Barcelona bid for Willian – and the offer of Malcom as part of swap deal

Chelsea have rejected an offer from Barcelona to swap Willian for Malcom plus cash.

It is understood that the Spanish giants are prepared to move Malcom on even though they paid £38 million for him from Bordeaux only last summer.

Willian has been a Barcelona target in the past, on more than one occasion, but Chelsea are not believed to be interested in letting him go for Malcom plus a sum of cash which would value the deal at around £50 million.

Even though Willian has just turned 30 and only has 18 months left on his current contract Chelsea value him higher than the proposal that was put to them by Barcelona representatives on Thursday.

Barcelona bought Malcom, 21, who have previously interested Tottenham Hotspur, after being rebuffed in their efforts to sign his fellow Brazilian, Willian.


Chelsea regard Willian as a key member of their squad and are looking to strengthen this window rather than let first-team regulars go. They have already had a series of offers from Bayern Munich for 18-year-old winger Callum Hudson-Odoi who is keen to leave.

Barcelona may look to sell Malcom, who they snatched away from Roma, in any case during this window even if they cannot interest Chelsea as he has struggled to get into their first-team squad.
